Really fun game, even if a little quick. The steam store says that the game could take 6-8 hours, but for me it took about 3. If you plan to play portal 2 and want some background info, definitely buy. If not, it's a great game on it's own that's worth the experience! Just remember that the cake is a lie.

One of my favourite games of all time and one of the best puzzle games ever made! Fun story, if you somehow havent been spoiled yet but even if you have the character of GlaDos is very funny! The puzzles are deceptively simple and extremely gratifying to complete! I cant recommend this game enough and it has an incredible sequel!
